title: Forklift Mechanic #685 NEW!
full_description: Work with a long standing and established operation as a Forklift Mechanic in the Metro Denver area. We are seeking a Field Service Mechanic to provide customer service excellence and positive team input. A take home service vehicle, smart phone and laptop are provided. Utilize your diagnostic know how with electronics, hydraulics and mechanical repair. Previous experience maintaining lift trucks or automotive repair is ideal. Clean driving record and a full set of tools are needed.Days, 7:30am - 4:30pm, Monday - Friday.$25.00 - $35.00/hour. Health insurance, paid time off & uniforms.
